main_definition: Happening refers to an event or occurrence taking place, often with the implication of being noteworthy or currently in progress.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Currently taking place or occurring; a matter that is happening
meanings_and_examples.example: The concert was sold out and many people were talking about the band's latest happening.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An event, incident, or occurrence of interest
meanings_and_examples.example: There has been quite a lot of drama surrounding her recent romantic situation; it's all becoming an unfolding happening.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Something that is currently in progress and drawing attention
meanings_and_examples.example: The political scandal involving the senator was making headlines as another important happening.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A trend or fashionable thing at a particular time
meanings_and_examples.example: The new dance craze is sweeping the nation; it's definitely one of the year's biggest happenings in the world of entertainment.
